lines.gurmukhi: drsn joiq ko audoq Ascrj mY; ikMcq ktwC kY ibsm koit iDAwn hY [

Unknown.translation: A sight of the divine refulgence of the True Guru is full of astonishment. A momentary glance of grace of the True Guru baffles millions of contemplation.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: drsn joiq ko audoq Ascrj mY siqgurwˆ dy drSn krn qoˆ AcrjmeI joq dw audoq audy pRgt krdw hY ArQwq drSn krn mwqR qy is`Kwˆ dy irdy AMdr AQvw siqgurwˆ dy msqk aupr BOck ivc pOx vwly pRkwS dI lwt dg dg krdI idKweI dyx lg ipAw krdI hY[ Aru ikMcqk ktwC kY ibsm koit iDAwn hY QoVw mwqR ikRpw BrI idRStI nwl siqgurwˆ dy q`kn qoˆ kRoVwˆ iDAwn hI AcMBy nUM pRwpq ho jwXw krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: mMd muskwin bwin prmdBuiq giq; mDur bcn kY Qkq koit igAwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Sweet smiling nature of the True Guru is marvellous. Millions of understandings and perceptions are paltry before his elixir like utterances.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Aqy mMq muskwin bwin prmdBuq giq mMd mMd sihj sihj hsmuKI bwn pRikRqI qbIAq Xw suBwv dI gqI dSw cwl prm AnoKI hY qy im`Ty imTy bcnwˆ kY Agy qwˆ kroVwˆ hI igAwn Qikq ho hu`t jwˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: eyk aupkwr ky ibQwr ko n pwrwvwru; koit aupkwr ismrn aunmwn hY [

Unknown.translation: The grandeur of a blessing of the True Guru is fathomless. And therefore, to remember other good deeds is trifle and meaningless.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: siqgurwˆ dy iek nwm dwn rUp aupkwr dy ivsqwr dw pwrwvwr (pwr aurwr) nhIˆ pwieAw jw skdw[ hor kRoVwˆ prkwr dy jo aupkwr (BlweI krn vw shwieqw pucwn Awid dy swDn) hn, auh cyqy krIey qwˆ aunmwn (aUn mwn) vwly qu`C idisAw krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: dieAwiniD ikRpwiniD suKiniD soBwiniD; mihmw inDwn gMimqw n kwhU Awn hY [142[

Unknown.translation: He is a treasure-house of kindness and ocean of clemency and sea of comforts. He is such a vast storehouse of praise and coffer of grandeur that no one else can reach it. (142)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: dieAw iniD ikRpw iniD suK iniD soBw iniD siqgurU dXw dy BMfwr hn Bwv hr pRkwr kr ky duKÎwirAwˆ dy du`K invwrx leI mwnoˆ Awp dy BMfwr Ku`ly pey hn, Aru AivdÎw dy ADIn Xw Brm BulyKy dy mwirAwˆ hoXwˆ Anyk ApRwDwˆ dy krx hwirAwˆ dy ApRwD bKSn leI ikrpw dy BI BMfwr Ku`ly rihMdy hn Bwv gurU brkqwˆ bKSn hwry prm audwr hn[ qy AYsw hI suKwˆ dy BI BMfwr hn, ArQwq ijs ijs mnicMdI dSw ivKy suK dy jwck lok AOˆdy hn sB dIAwˆ hI Es Es pRkwr murwdwˆ BOxIAwˆ pUrIAwˆ krdy hn[ ievyˆ hI Awp soBw dy BI BMfwr hn[ hr pRkwr dI SoBw dy lYk srxwgqwˆ nUM bxwn hwry hn[ iksy pRkwr mihmw inDwn gMimqw n kwhU Awn hY mihmw dy BI Kzwny vw smuMdr hn srxwgqwˆ nUM mhwˆ mihmwvwn bnwx leI sm`rQ hn, kwhUM Awn iksy hor Avqwr vlI pIr pYgMbr nUM Enwˆ dI brobrI dI gMimqw nhIˆ hY ]142]
